issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
The documentation requires to click on 
http://build.appcelerator.net
to download the laset continuous build of the Titanium SDK
but the correct URL is 
http://builds.appcelerator.com/

h3. Actual Result
URL build.appcelerator.net does not work

h3. Expected Result
The fix proposed by the documentation to reinstall the Android SDK can not be applied
fields.summary: Wrong URL in documentation to download continuous build

comments.body: [~averon] Can you provide a link? We have a lot of documentation. *EDIT*: Got it: http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Installing_Titanium_SDK_Continuous_Builds
Fixed the [linked Wiki-page|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Installing+Titanium+SDK+Continuous+Builds] to the correct URL. It should be indexed soon, thank you [~averon]!
